title: delete folder - while files are being uploaded from other client
body:
### expected behaviour
the server should notice when a folder has been deleted from another client, while an upload is on progress

### actual behaviour
it is shown an alert message: "not enough storage available", althouth there is.

### steps to reproduce
1. connect to the same owncloud account in two different browsers
2. create a folder in  browser1, test upload
3. upload somehing large, for instance 100 mb
4. from the browser 2, delete the folder test upload
5. looking at the browser1, once the upload finishes there is an alert message "not enough storage"

### server configuration
acceptance-testing master_on_apache_with_sqlite
[2013-03-13t07:53:39+00:00] info: git[/usr/local/src/owncloud-core] updated to revision f3a2daaa9d4fd574236b9168cdd6b0598d8578ce

[2013-03-13t07:54:19+00:00] info: git[/usr/local/src/owncloud-apps] updated to revision 17d35f742e31c523cc32c561f68cefdb9f0a4f12

### client configuration
browser: firefox and chrome

operating system: mac 10.7.5

### logs
````
[wed mar 13 10:26:11 2013] [error] [client 33.33.33.1] php warning:  filemtime(): stat failed for /var/www/data/admin/files/test in /var/www/lib/files/storage/local.php on line 92, referer: http://33.33.33.10/index.php/apps/files
```
